duties_responsibilities.duty: Uncover and secure new business opportunities within specific market segments.
Utilize ZoomInfo and LinkedIn Navigator for prospecting and building outreach lists.
Organize meetings with local contacts and prospects to increase reservations and revenues.
Qualify and secure contracted business opportunities during need periods.
Review and negotiate rates for specified segments and manage rate loading process.
Achieve weekly activity goals, log all contacts and actions in CRM system.
Qualify all incoming requests and secure bookings.
Achieve quarterly sales revenue goals for assigned segments.
Implement a sales action plan for designated market segment.
Utilize all tools provided to promote and familiarize clients, including virtual 3D tours.
Partner closely with sales coordinator, client services manager, and operations team.
Maintain regular attendance and adhere to image requirements policy.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent, preferably in hospitality or a related field.
